alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Sedgwick (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 8:09PM MDT until May 30 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Phillips County in northeastern Colorado... Southeastern Sedgwick County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 809 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Pleasant Valley, or 6 miles east of Holyoke, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Holyoke, Amherst and Pleasant Valley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
